document_data.name: The Stone Crab Coster
document_data.mainbody: The '''Stone Crab Coster''' was a shop selling seafood in the city of [[Archenbridge]] during the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The shop was located on the northern part of town, near [[Pelter's Street]].
document_data.Services: The shop specialized in selling freshwater [[crab]]s and [[crayfish]], as well as various seafood from the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]].
